gen:link.msg:message: `FundsMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract5_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract5_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract5_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract5_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesAndFundsMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReservesMember` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying children members. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_SumOfMembersOnAbstract return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReservesAndFundsStatementOfChangesFundraising_PrtFST1SumOfMembersOnAbstract3_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
